text: hananim-eun haneulgwa daejileul jinlilosseo changjohasa bam-eulo hayeogeum naj eul deopge hago naj-eulo hayeogeum bam-euldeopge hayeoss-eumyeo taeyang-gwa dallo hayeo geum geubun-ui beobchig-e bogjongke hani gagjaneun jeonghayeojin sigan-e unhaenghanilasillo geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa gwan-yong-eulo chung manhasim-ila
